writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel dest, int flags)

fromIntent(android.content.Intent).Description: Retrieves the location settings states from the intent extras. When the location settings dialog finishes, you can use this method to retrieve the current location settings states from the intent in your @B_android#app#Activity#onActivityResult_E@;

isNetworkLocationPresent().Description: Whether network location provider is present on the device.

isBleUsable().Description: Whether BLE is enabled and is usable by the app.

isNetworkLocationUsable().Description: Whether network location provider is enabled and usable by the app.

isGpsUsable().Description: Whether GPS provider is enabled and is usable by the app.

isBlePresent().Description: Whether BLE is present on the device.

isLocationPresent().Description: Whether location is present on the device. This method returns true when either GPS or network location provider is present.

isGpsPresent().Description: Whether GPS provider is present on the device.

isLocationUsable().Description: Whether location is enabled and is usable by the app. This method returns true when either GPS or network location provider is usable.

ClassDesc: Stores the current states of all location-related settings.
